task_description:
Task: Remove PeppeGPT and RAG System

  Objective

  Completely remove the PeppeGPT chat assistant and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system from the portfolio website.

  Files/Directories to DELETE

  Frontend Chat Feature (entire directory):
  - /src/features/chat/ - 18 files including components, context, services, hooks, utils, and tests

  Backend (entire directories):
  - /backend/ - Local development backend
  - /hf/ - Hugging Face Spaces backend

  Files to MODIFY

  1. /src/App.js
  - Remove imports: ChatProvider, ChatLauncher, ChatPanel, ErrorBoundary, useChat
  - Remove <ChatProvider> wrapper
  - Remove <ChatLauncher />, <ChatPanel />, and <ErrorBoundary> components
  - Remove isChatEnabled logic

  2. /src/components/Home/Home.js
  - Remove import: ProminentChatButton, useChat
  - Remove <ProminentChatButton /> component
  - Remove isChatEnabled logic

  3. /src/App.integration.test.js
  - Remove ChatPanel mocking

  4. /version.json
  - Remove backend URL reference

  5. /.github/workflows/deploy.yml
  - Remove backend testing job (lines ~56-82)
  - Remove HF Spaces deployment job (lines ~113-161)
  - Remove backend validation in validate-deployment job (lines ~163-180)

  Environment Variables to Remove

  - REACT_APP_PEPPEGPT_API
  - REACT_APP_CHAT_ENABLED

  Documentation to Update/Remove

  - /docs/prd.md
  - /docs/architecture.md
  - /docs/brief.md
  - /docs/stories/ - Multiple story files referencing chat
  - /docs/epics/ - Multiple epic files referencing chat
  - /docs/architecture/ - Architecture docs
  - /backend/README.md
  - /deploy/README.md

  Acceptance Criteria

  - All chat-related frontend components removed
  - Backend directories completely removed
  - App.js renders without chat components
  - Home.js renders without chat button
  - CI/CD pipeline no longer deploys to HF Spaces
  - No broken imports or references
  - All tests pass
  - Build succeeds
